<table-wrap id="tbl1" position="float">
<label>1</label>
<caption>
<title>Accessible Surface Area (ASA), Accessible
Volume (AV), Largest Included Sphere (<italic>D</italic>
<sub>I</sub>), Largest Free Sphere (<italic>D</italic>
<sub>F</sub>), Open Metal
Site Volumetric Density (ρ<sub>Mg</sub>), and Open Metal Site
Weight Percent of Two Frameworks: Mg<sub>2</sub>(DHFUMA) vs Mg<sub>2</sub>(DOBDC)</title>

<sub>I</sub>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center" rowsep="1">
<italic>D</italic>
<sub>F</sub>
</oasis:entry>

</oasis:entry>

</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry align="center">ligand</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">[m<sup>2</sup>/g]</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">[cm<sup>3</sup>/g]</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">[Å]</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">[Å]</oasis:entry>

</oasis:row>
</oasis:thead>
<oasis:tbody>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>DOBDC</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>1782</oasis:entry>

</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>

<oasis:entry>0.095</oasis:entry>

<oasis:entry>6.3</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>0.0084</oasis:entry>

</oasis:row>
</oasis:tbody>
</oasis:tgroup>
</oasis:table>
</table-wrap>
clean_text:
Table 1. Accessible Surface Area (ASA), Accessible Volume (AV), Largest Included Sphere (DI), Largest Free Sphere (DF), Open Metal Site Volumetric Density (ρMg), and Open Metal Site Weight Percent of Two Frameworks: Mg2(DHFUMA) vs Mg2(DOBDC)

| ligand | ASA [m²/g] | AV [cm³/g] | DI [Å] | DF [Å] | ρMg [Mg/Å³] | wt % Mg |
|--------|-----------|------------|-------|-------|-------------|---------|
| DOBDC  | 1782      | 0.350      | 11.8  | 11.1  | 0.0044      | 20.0    |
| DHFUMA | 1043      | 0.095      | 7.6   | 6.3   | 0.0084      | 25.2    |
